name: Dice-o Shoot-o
description:
My take on the GMTK Game Jam 2022 theme "Roll of the Dice". A shooter where you play as a die, roll around, and shoot small dice at other dice. The amount and pattern of projectiles spawned by you and your enemies is based on the top face value of the die itself. Hope you enjoy!

Controls: 

  • W/A/S/D to move up/left/down/right
  • Spacebar to shoot
  • Above keys can be held to perform the action continuously
